html: (1 Nephi 21:23; 2 Nephi 6:7, 13)."They shall bow down to thee … and lick up the dust of thy feet." Those who formerly despised and oppressed the Jews and the rest of the house of Israel "the covenant people of the Lord" (2 Nephi 6:13) will reverse their roles. "The sons also of them that afflicted thee shall come bending unto thee; and all they that despised thee shall bow themselves down at the soles of thy feet." (Isaiah 60:14.)
